name: Chopped Apple and Manchego Salad
author: Alysa1014
summary: This unexpected, vibrant, fresh salad can be enjoyed alone. It can also be served in a variety of vessels as an appetizer--such as atop crostini, in mini phyllo cups, or in endive cups.
ingredients: 1 pinch salt and ground black pepper, or to taste
4  Granny Smith apples, diced into 1/8-inch cubes
¾ cup Manchego cheese, diced into 1/8-inch cubes
directions: Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper together in a small bowl
Mix apples, Manchego cheese, chives, and almonds together in a large bowl
Pour in lemon juice dressing and toss to combine
